[ library(ic_kernel) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

ic_event(++Event)

Indicates that the specified event has occured.
Event
The short name of the event to record

Description

Indicates that the specified event has occured. Can be left in production code as the call succeeds very quickly when stats gathering is not turned on.

See Also

ic_stat / 1, ic_stat_get / 1, ic_stat_register_event / 2
